rules_text:
As Extinction Specialist enters, note two creature types.
Whenever Extinction Specialist enters or attacks, choose one of the noted creature types. Creatures you don't control of the chosen type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]He's found the cure to growing older.[/i]
notes: I Slept With Someone in Fall Out Boy and All I Got Was This Stupid Song Written About Me — Fall Out Boy
